title: Just My Size Wireless Bra Pack, Full Coverage, Leopard Satin, Wirefree Plus-Size Bra; aizes from 32C to 50DD; ajustable straps in the front; 90% nylon, 10% spandex; everyday bra pack and 1 satin bra; leopard print and other colors (white, nude, and others)
descriptions:
Introducing the Just My Size Wireless Bra Pack, the perfect choice for those seeking comfort and support in a plus-size bra. Made from a high-quality blend of 90% nylon and 10% spandex, this wirefree bra offers all-around comfort and stretch. Each pack includes one satin bra, providing you with great value.

Designed for a full-coverage fit, this bra features a soft lining that offers secure coverage for larger busts. The wide band helps shape and hold you in place, offering everyday wireless support that lasts. The front-adjustable straps ensure a perfect fit without any strain.

With a variety of color options including a stylish leopard print, as well as classic colors like white and nude, this bra is suitable for any occasion. Available in sizes ranging from 32C to plus sizes 50DD, we have options for everyone. Don't compromise on comfort, choose the Just My Size Wireless Bra Pack for the perfect combination of style and support.

generation_prompt_text:
Write an advertising description for the following product. Use the existing description below as a guideline, matching it roughly in quality and level of detail. Do not include information not available in the description below. Do not directly plagiarize the description below. Be concise and informative. Assume potential buyers who read the ad have access to a photo of the product, and are scanning through many different similar advertisements, spending little time on each, and that they value being able to quickly see the most important details.

---

Title: Just My Size Wireless Bra Pack, Full Coverage, Leopard Satin, Wirefree Plus-Size Bra; aizes from 32C to 50DD; ajustable straps in the front; 90% nylon, 10% spandex; everyday bra pack and 1 satin bra; leopard print and other colors (white, nude, and others)

Description: Just My Size Wireless Bra Pack, Full Coverage, Leopard Satin, Wirefree Plus-Size Bra, (Sizes from 32C to 50DD)

QUALITY FABRIC – The best wireless bra for large busts, this style is made from stretchy 90% nylon/10% spandex for all-around comfort.

VALUE YOU EXPECT – Each everyday women's bra pack of 1 comes with one satin bra.

FULL-COVERAGE FIT – Our soft lining is great for large busts since it provides allover coverage for that secure fit you love.

SUPPORT YOU NEED – A wide band helps shape and hold you in place for everyday wireless support that lasts. Rows of hook-and-eye closures keep you secure.

FRONT-ADJUSTABLE STRAPS – Soft, wide straps can be adjusted in the front, so no need to strain in order to find the perfect fit.

COLORS & SIZE OPTIONS – From black bras with a leopard print and other colors like white, nude, and beyond, to sizes 32C to plus sizes 50DD, we have options for everyone.
